backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, vocabulary storage, access control checks, and CRUD-like operations for authenticated users.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence records mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing the purpose of each frontend TypeScript/React file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining theme variables, dark mode overrides, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main client script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theme and router providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication gate showing the landing page with features when unauthenticated and rendering children when logged in.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first-time users to set up source/target languages and create their profile using backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandHe: Renders the app logo and optionally a large title based on size prop.
frontend/src/components/branding/HeroIll: Displays a full-width hero illustration image inside a styled container.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Metric: Shows three metric cards (practice count, accuracy, due items) with icons and styling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with top navigation, content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with brand header, route links, and user login/badge controls.
frontend/src/components/practice/Practic: Manages a practice question flow with answer input, submission, feedback, and navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/practice/TutorPa: Shows detailed tutor feedback with hints, suggestions, and user vs expected answers.
frontend/src/components/user/UserBadge.t: Displays the user’s active language pair with avatar initials and language names.
frontend/src/components/vocabulary/Delet: Confirmation dialog for deleting a vocabulary item, calling delete mutation on confirm.
frontend/src/components/vocabulary/Vocab: Dialog form for adding or editing vocabulary items with fields, validation, and save handling.
Renders a searchable list of vocabulary items with edit/delete actions, tags, and stats, using a delete confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardMetrics.t: Computes dashboard metrics such as accuracy, due item count, and today's practice count from user profile and review data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and actions using Internet Identity, managing identity loading, login, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations and review actions on vocabulary and user profile data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes and UI color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ConversationPage.tsx: Implements an interactive conversation practice flow using vocabulary items, generating prompts, collecting answers, and submitting results.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user dashboard with metrics, actions, and profile setup gating, showing loading skeletons and navigation cards.
frontend/src/pages/PracticePage.tsx: Handles practice sessions by generating exercises, tracking progress, submitting results, and gating access based on profile and vocabulary.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Shows user settings including language preferences and account stats, with profile setup gating and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/VocabularyPage.tsx: Manages vocabulary list display and editing, with add-word dialog and profile setup gating.
frontend/src/types/practice.ts: Defines Exercise, PracticeResult, and exercise type enums for practice functionality.
frontend/src/utils/conversation/generate: Generates conversation prompts using vocabulary items with acceptable replies and optional alternatives parsed from notes.
frontend/src/utils/practice/generateExer: Creates randomized translation or fill‑in‑the‑blank exercises from vocabulary items.
frontend/src/utils/tutor/editDistance.ts: Implements Levenshtein distance and close‑match checking for answer evaluation.
frontend/src/utils/tutor/feedback.ts: Generates detailed feedback for user answers, including handling multiple acceptable answers and similarity checks.
frontend/src/utils/tutor/normalize.ts: Normalizes text and checks answer equivalence by lowercasing, trimming, and removing diacritics.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove sensitive params from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining theme colors, container settings, animations, and plugin setup for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing the project’s current state, features, and requirements for a language‑learning web app.
